Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Task 6.38: Add detailed logging to GitHub analyzer for debugging

- Add step-by-step progress logging (Step 1/6 ~ 6/6)
- Add individual commit fetch logging with progress
- Add detailed error information (type, message, status, response, stack)
- Add execution time tracking for each phase
- Add comprehensive error handling in commit detail fetching

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Task 6.39: Fix Slack interactive handler to use await instead of background execution

- Change from background async execution to synchronous await
- Ensure finishDocumentationProcess completes before function terminates
- Add proper success/failure response handling
- Fix Vercel Serverless function termination issue

This resolves the silent crash issue where Part 2 documentation
was being interrupted due to function termination after response.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
